title: General
stimulusHtml: 1 point for identifying any of the following: that they could have died together; that they had died by the same sword; that Dido had called Anna to die with her; that they had suffered the same fate; needs to indicate Anna’s desire to share death, etc., with Dido; e.g., may say “together or too.
descriptions: That they could have died together; that they had died by the same sword; that Dido had called Anna to die with her; that they had suffered the same fate; needs to indicate Anna’s desire to share death, etc., with Dido; e.g., may say “together or too.
